title: Anna Wintour Fights Back Tears When Honoring Late Franca Sozzani at 2017 CFDA Fashion Awards

twitter.title: Anna Wintour Fights Back Tears When Honoring Late Franca Sozzani at 2017 CFDA Fashion Awards
twitter.description: Tonight was an emotional evening for Vogue’s Editor-in-chief, Anna Wintour. The famously private publishing star presented the Icon Award to the late Franca Sozzani at the 2017 CFDA……
